room_title: Escape room "CLOO: A Murder Mystery" by Escape Cape in Cape Girardeau
room_description:
You were invited to the home of Mr. Montgomery Merrick for a dinner party. However, the evening turned out to be more eventful than anyone had planned. Mr. Montgomery Merrick himself has been murdered. It is unclear as to which of the guests did it, in what room it was done, and with what weapon.

This is a 90 minute room. You will be asked to take on one of the 8 characters, such as Professor Pickle or Major Merlot. Then, you will begin your adventure in the lounge where the story begins to unfold.

However, it isn't just escaping that you must do...you must also correctly identify who, where and with what if you want to be successful in this game!

Do you have what it takes?
